page.title: 10Industry 1
page.content: This is a surburban and rural area,with few factories. ROADMIX is based in an old quarry off Ballycraigy Rd.,where there is room for the heavy crushing machinery which produces coarse grit.Lorries transport the grit to various D.O.E. projects. PLASTERMIX,a firm engaged in making plaster for the building trade,is on the same site.The product is packed in different colours. THE PALLET CENTRE,in W. Ballyearl area is a big building where pallets(wooden frames on which boxes can be stacked, for fork-lift trucks to raise)are made -approx. 1000 per day. GREY and ADAMS is near by.Refrigerated containers for transporting perishable food are made here. Thus there is no HEAVY INDUSTRY,and little LIGHT INDUSTRY in our area.
